body.bibl: Playoust, Catherine. “The Beauty of Jesus and His Twin: Redirected Erotics in the Acts of Thomas.” In The Levant: Crossroads of Late Antiquity. History, Religion and Archaeology / Le Levant: Carrefour de l’Antiquité Tardive. Histoire, Religion et Archéologie, edited by Ellen Bradshaw Aitken and John M. Fossey, 35–63. McGill University Monographs in Classical Archaeology and History 22. Leiden: Brill, 2014.
